items.name: The Next Reddit
items.text: Implementing someone else's redesign of Reddit, as a userstyle/userscript

items.name: The Edge Checkin System
items.text: Working with a group at The Edge, making a system to faciliate interaction between users. The Edge is a digital culture center, and getting people connected and helping each other is a challenge, so we're working on a system to make that easier

items.name: Wahwah
items.text: Playing around with some new sounds, and I think this one turned out nice!

items.name: Orch2
items.text: Getting a little more familiar with orchestral instruments, particularly the brass and strings

items.name: Summer Lite
items.text: Playing around with covers, this sort of sprung up

items.name: YabYab
items.text: This came out very nicely, one of the pieces I'm prouder of. The second half of it was my attempt at a more techno/dubstepy rhythm… Didn't get it exactly, but I'm pleased with how it turned out

items.name: Laker
items.link-text: Picture of a lake close to where I live

items.name: Show
items.text: First foray into orchestral—turned out a little bit creepy, but nice

items.name: equinoxnet
items.link-text: an irc network, that's now been shut down

items.name: Red
items.text: One of my first little tunes, using Milkytracker
